section.p: A policy activity represents the policy or program providing the coverage. The person for whom payment is being provided (i.e. the patient) is the covered party. The subscriber of the policy or program is represented as a participant that is the holder the coverage. The payer is represented as the performer of the policy activity.

ol.li: Conforms to CDA Act
CONF-49: SHALL contain [1..1] @classCode = "ACT"
CONF-50: SHALL contain [1..1] @moodCode = "EVN"
CONF-51: SHALL contain [1..*] id
CONF-52, CONF-53: SHALL contain [1..1] statusCode/@code = "completed" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus STATIC V3NE08)
CONF-54, CONF-55: SHOULD contain [1..1] code, which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.19832 ActCoverageType DYNAMIC

CONF-56: SHALL contain [1..1] performer, such that it
contains Payer Entity

CONF-58: SHALL contain [1..1] participant, such that it
contains Covered Party

CONF-63: MAY contain [1..1] participant, such that it
contains Policy Subscriber
CONF-56: SHALL satisfy: A policy activity contains exactly one performer [@typeCode='PRF'], representing the payer.
CONF-58: SHALL satisfy: A policy activity contains exactly one participant [@typeCode='COV'], representing the covered party.

CONF-61: MAY satisfy: The value for participant / participantRole / code in a policy activity's covered party MAY be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.19809 PolicyOrProgramCoverageRoleType DYNAMIC.
CONF-62: MAY satisfy: A covered party in a policy activity MAY contain exactly one participant / time, to represent the time period over which the patient is covered.
CONF-63: MAY satisfy: A policy activity MAY contain exactly one participant [@typeCode='HLD'], representing the subscriber.
CONF-65: MAY satisfy: A subscriber in a policy activity MAY contain exactly one participant / time, to represent the time period for which the subscriber is enrolled.
CONF-66: SHALL satisfy: The value for entryRelationship / @typeCode in a policy activity SHALL be 'REFR' 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1002 ActRelationshipType STATIC.

CONF-67: SHALL satisfy: The target of a policy activity with entryRelationship / @typeCode='REFR' SHALL be an Authorization Activity or an Act, with Act [@classCode = 'ACT'] and Act [@moodCode = 'DEF'], representing a description of the coverage plan.
